Description: Ensures that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique and not duplicated, maintaining entity integrity.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks that all records in tsb.customer_data_bank have a non-null customer_id, as required by the primary key constraint.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where full_name is missing, which may impact customer identification and communication.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where date_of_birth is missing, which may impact age calculations and eligibility checks.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where gender is missing, which may affect demographic analysis and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where address is missing, which may impact customer contact and regulatory compliance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where phone_number is missing, which may hinder customer communication.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where email_address is missing, which may hinder electronic communication with customers.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where national_id_or_passport_number is missing, which may impact identity verification and compliance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where occupation is missing, which may affect customer profiling and risk assessment.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where customer_type is missing, which may impact segmentation and service eligibility.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where account_numbers is missing, which may affect account linkage and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where age is missing, which may impact demographic analysis and eligibility checks.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_by is missing, which may hinder auditability and traceability.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_on is missing, which may impact audit trails and record lifecycle tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_by is missing, which may hinder tracking of record updates.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_on is missing, which may hinder tracking of record updates.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where status is missing, which may impact workflow and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Checks that age values are not negative, ensuring logical consistency for age data.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND age < 0

Description: Ensures that date_of_birth values are not in the future, maintaining logical consistency.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth > CURRENT_DATE

Description: Checks for email_address values that do not match a basic email pattern, which may indicate invalid entries.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~* '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Identifies phone_number values that do not contain only digits, spaces, dashes, or plus signs, which may indicate invalid entries.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~* '^[0-9+\-\s]+$'

Description: Checks that gender values are within expected domain (e.g., Male, Female, Other, Unspecified).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other','Unspecified')

Description: Checks that status values are within expected domain (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended')

Description: Identifies duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which may indicate duplicate customer records.
Custom_SQL: SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Identifies duplicate email_address values, which may indicate duplicate customer records.
Custom_SQL: SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for inconsistencies between age and date_of_birth (difference in years should match age).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND age <> EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(CURRENT_DATE, date_of_birth))

Description: Checks that created_on is not after modified_on, ensuring logical record modification sequence.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on > modified_on

Description: Checks for account_numbers that are empty strings, which may indicate missing account linkage.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers = ''

Description: Checks for customer_id values that are not positive integers, ensuring correct data type usage.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NOT NULL AND customer_id <= 0
